main event: An unidentified oval-shaped object was observed in the Pacific for 25 minutes, displaying various colors and complex maneuvers.
interesting points: The object was oval-shaped and displayed colors of red, white, blue, and green.
The object hovered and maneuvered for 25 minutes before turning slightly and disappearing.
The object was observed at an estimated altitude of 10,000 feet using 7x50 binoculars.
A separate sighting of a larger-than-first-magnitude object was observed for 2 minutes, descending and then leveling off.
The second sighting was observed by a staff watch officer using a 25-power glass, at an elevation of 15 degrees and a bearing of 330 degrees.
sighted object: oval-shaped object with red, white, blue, and green colors
